The Motivation Myth

Motivation is a feeling. It‚Äôs fleeting and unreliable. You can‚Äôt wait to feel motivated to work out. You must build discipline.

Tips for Building Discipline

  1. Set Clear Goals: Instead of ‚ÄúI want to get fit,‚Äù set a goal like ‚ÄúI will work out 3 times this week for 30 minutes.‚Äù
  2. Find Your ‚ÄúWhy‚Äù: Why are you doing this? To play with your kids? To feel more confident? Remind yourself of this daily.
  3. Don‚Äôt Break the Chain: Try to be active every day, even if it‚Äôs just a 10-minute walk. Consistency builds habit.
  4. Track Your Progress: Seeing how far you‚Äôve come is a powerful motivator in itself.
